ch.neukom.lanternahelper

Class LanternaTextWriter

  • Object
    • LanternaTextWriter

  • public class LanternaTextWriter
extends Object
    this class provied helper methods to write longer text to a Screen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LanternaTextWriter(Screen screen) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void printCharacterToArea(char character, TerminalPosition start, TerminalPosition end)
      print a character to a area of the terminal, defined by two points
      void printCharacterToColumn(char character, int column)
      print a character to a entire column of the terminal
      void printCharacterToRow(char character, int row)
      print a character to a entire row of the terminal
      void printText(String text, int column, int row)
      print some text from a starting point to the edge of the terminal, new lines are respected
      void printTextArea(String text, int column, int row, int limitColumn, int limitRow)
      print some text from a starting point in a given area, new lines are respected

                                   int column)
        print a character to a entire column of the terminal

        column - the column to print to

                                int row)
        print a character to a entire row of the terminal
        Parameters:

        row - the row to print to

      • printCharacterToArea

        public void printCharacterToArea(char character,
                                 TerminalPosition start,
                                 TerminalPosition end)
        print a character to a area of the terminal, defined by two points
        Parameters:
        character - the character to print
        start - the starting point of the area
        end - the ending point of the area

      • printText

        public void printText(String text,
                      int column,
                      int row)
        print some text from a starting point to the edge of the terminal, new lines are respected
        Parameters:
        text - the text to print
        column - the column where you want to start printing
        row - the row where you want to start printing

      • printTextArea

        public void printTextArea(String text,
                          int column,
                          int row,
                          int limitColumn,
                          int limitRow)
        print some text from a starting point in a given area, new lines are respected
        Parameters:
        text - the text to print
        column - the column where you want to start printing
        row - the row where you want to start printing
        limitColumn - the column where you want the text to end, this gets reduced to the terminal size if bigger
        limitRow - the row where you want the text to end, this gets reduced to the terminal size if bigger
